title.rendered: Eldorado Launches Eldorado Outdoor at the Kitchen & Bath Industry Show

content.rendered: Residential Design & Build magazine editor, Rob Hesselbarth, tours the Eldorado Outdoor line with Brent Spann, Eldorado Stone’s VP of Marketing, at the Kitchen and Bath Industry Show in Chicago. This footage is posted on Residential Design & Build’s website: RDBmagazine.com

excerpt.rendered: Residential Design & Build magazine editor, Rob Hesselbarth, tours the Eldorado Outdoor line with Brent Spann, Eldorado Stone’s VP of Marketing, at the Kitchen and Bath Industry Show in Chicago. This footage is posted on Residential Design & Build’s website: RDBmagazine.com
